MGHView¶

class oct.MGHView(directory, state)¶

Bases: object

A modified viewer and labeller for .mgh files built on a napari viewer

Notes

Does not require the napari-mgh plugin to be installed as this is a unique napari viewer, loading is taken care of within the class, using memory mapping

Methods

__init__(directory, state)

Initialize self.

normalizeData(mat)

Returned data normalized between 0 and 1 using the CPU

populateWindow(viewer, data)

run()
